error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'String'.
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Boolean'. Did you mean 'boolean'?

error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?

asyncDeclare_es6.ts(1,31): error TS2583: Cannot find name 'Promise'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to 'es2015' or later.
